players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any information that might help us figure out what happened."
You: "I'm concerned about Bob's sudden death and think we should all share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it seems. Let's work together to solve this mystery."

Diana: "I agree with Alice that we should all share any information we have to help solve the mystery of Bob's death. I didn't notice anything unusual last night, but if I recall, Charlie was the one who found Bob's body."

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. I found Bob's body last night and I didn't notice anything unusual, but I do remember seeing Diana acting suspiciously before the..."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
